title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error is shown. However, as part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set, without displaying an error.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try creating a new table group.
